title: Carrot  & parsnip soup with coconut milk

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the parsnips and carrots for
minutes. Add the ground coriander and cook for 1 minute.
Add the coconut milk and stock, bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 10-12 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
Purée, season and add the fresh coriander. Serve with crusty bread.
